name: Danganronpa: Restrained Nature PROLOGUE
description:
" This Social Experiment will help you further develop your talent". This is what Yuna Kaigosha, Ultimate Child Caregiver, thought was going to happen, but instead, her and another couple of Ultimates are thrown in a cruel killing game run by a genocidal black and white bear. Will Yuna be able to face the killing game by trusting her new comrades, or these so-called friends will betray her and stab her in the back

THIS FANGAME IS BASED ON SPIKE CHUNSOFT'S "DANGANRONPA" SERIES. ALL COPYRIGHTS BELONG TO SPIKE CHUNSOFT AND THIS GAME WILL NOT BE USED FOR ANY COMMERCIAL PURPOSES

This game may contain some scenes that may be disturbing for some people, so player discretion is advised
